revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pokémon Tower |image = [[File:Pokemon Tower.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of the Pokémon Tower. |tokens = 750 |location = West of Lavender Town }} The '''Pokémon Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 7,523 HP. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=5|[[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly || [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Hope || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Patricia || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Carly || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Laurel || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly, [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Jody || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | rowspan=5|[[File:Haunter.png|40px]] Haunter || [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Paula || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Ruth || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Tammy || [[File:Haunter.png|40px]] Haunter |- | [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Karina || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Janae || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | rowspan=6|[[File:Cubone.png|40px]] Cubone || [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Angelica || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly, [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly, [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Jennifer || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Channeler.png|40px]] Channeler Emilia || [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing, [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Drowzee |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate,
[[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- |} ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Marowak.png|40px]] Marowak ||

Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 52.07% || 50.63% || 44.44% |- | {{Bag2|Chesto}} || N/A || 26.03% || 25.32% || 22.22% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 20.85% || 22.14% || 27.72% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.11% |- | {{Bag2|Medium Restore}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.11% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.11% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.11% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Rare Bone}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.08% || 0.39% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.08% || 0.39% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.08% || 0.39% |} ===Debuff Drop Table=== After Reaching Sinnoh, the drop chance for items in Kanto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic). {| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 50.45% || 50.45% || 50.45% |- | {{Bag2|Chesto}} || N/A || 25.23% || 25.23% || 25.23% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 24.22% || 24.22% || 24.22% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Medium Restore}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Rare Bone}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |} {{Kanto Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #1 - Kanto^f]]
